mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MARKET_PRICE (LABEL, NAME, PRICE_BTC, PRICE_USD, PRICE_CNY, PRICE_EUR, PRICE_GBP, PRICE_RUR, VOLUME, TIMESTAMP) VALUES(#{label}, #{name}, #{price_btc_result}, #{price_usd_result}, #{price_cny_result}, #{price_eur_result}, #{price_gbp_result}, #{price_rur_result}, #{volume_24h_result}, ${timestamp})
